channel.title: Persuasion on Mianshi Handbook
channel.description: Recent content in Persuasion on Mianshi Handbook

item.title: Persuade Boss About Proposal
item.description: Tell me about a time when you had to present a proposal to a person in authority and were able to do this successfully.

item.title: Present A Proposal
item.description: Tell me about a time when you had to present a proposal to a person in authority and were able to do this successfully.

item.title: Persuade Coworkers
item.description: Describe for me a situation where you persuaded team members to do things your way. What was the effect?
